version_description:
Features in this update include:

- A brand new playable character from Mega Jump's past: PonPon the high-flying panda!
- Send and receive gifts to and from your Game Center Friends for sweet prizes and treasure!
- Bug fixes for pesky problems and better performance!

A bevy of bug fixes! Including:

- A significant crash occurring with some players on launch has been fixed!
- Some players reported backgrounds were not appearing when starting a game, also fixed.
- A few players also might have seen missing images in the store, it's now fixed.
- And many other fixes to improve performance!

Update 1.2 includes:

- Our newest character is a hoot - meet Ollie the Owl!
- A brand new theme with new music to jump on through!
- Bug fixes making this the best running and most stable Mega Jump 2 yet!

Thanks to all the Mega Jumpers out there!

Update 1.2.1 includes:

- We fixed an issue with Ollie the Owl - he's all better now and ready to fly!
- A few more bug fixes for boosted performance!

Thanks to all the Mega Jumpers out there!

This latest update improves performance and stability.

Keep jumping!

This latest update improves performance and stability.

Keep jumping!
